title: How MLB Umpires Learned to Explain Replays to Crowds
description: Major League Baseball trailed other leagues in having its officials explain calls to fans and broadcasters. For umpires accustomed to saying little, there was a learning curve.
dc:creator: Alan Blinder and Maddie McGarvey
media:description: “Over time, your comfortableness makes it easier, I guess,” Mark Carlson said of the announcements umpires now make during Major League Baseball games.
